rukus.text: Hajja haiche nirdista mahasamuhata. Eteke yiye e'i mahasamuhata hajja karaibalai sthira karae si yena hajjara samayata strai-sambhoga, an'yaya acarana arau kalaha-bibada nakarae; arau tomaloke yi satkame'i nakaraa kiya seya allahe jane arau tomaloke sambala sangraha karaa. Niscaya ata'itakai uttama sambala haiche takbaraa. He bibeka sampanna byaktisakala! Tomaloke kerala morae'i takbaraa aralambana karaa

Tomalokara pratipalakara anugraha sandhana karaata tomalokara kono papa nahaya. Eteke tomaloke yetiya araaphatara paraa ubhati ahiba tetiya masba'araula haraamara ocarata allahaka smarana karaiba arau te'om tomalokaka yenekai siksa diche thika tenekai tomaloke te'omka smarana karaiba. Yadi'o iyara agata tomaloke bibhraantasakalara antarbhukta achila
Tara pichata an'yan'ya loke ya'ra paraa ubhati ahe tomaloke'o se'i sthanara paraa ubhati ahiba arau allahara ocarata ksama praarthana karaa. Niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu

Tara pichata yetiya tomaloke hajjara kamasamuha samapta karaiba tetiya allahaka enekai smarana karaiba yenekai tomaloke nijara pitr-purausasakalaka smarana karai thaka athaba tatokai'o adhika. Manuhara majata yiye kaya, ‘he amara pratipalaka! Amaka prthiraite'i (sakalo) di diya’. Akhiraatata tara babe kono ansa na'i
Arau sihamtara majata yiye kaya, ‘he amara pratipalaka! Amaka prthiraita kalyana pradana karaa arau akhiraatato kalyana diya arau amaka jahannamara sastira paraa raksa karaa’
E'omloke yi arjana karaiche se'i praapya ansa e'omlokara babe'i, arau allaha hicapa grahanata atyanta tatpara

Arau tomaloke nirdista dinasamuhata allahaka smarana karaiba. Eteke konoba'i yadi khara-khedakai dudinate'i guci ahe tente tara kono papa naha’ba arau yiye alapa palamakai ahiba tarao kono papa naha’ba. E'ito tara babe yiye takbaraa aralambana karae, arau tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau jani thoraa ye, tomalokaka te'omra ocarate'i samabeta karaa ha’ba
Arau manuhara majata ene byakti'o ache, parthira jiranata yara kathabarta'i tomaka mugdha karae arau tara antarata yi ache se'i samparke allahaka saksi raakhe. Prakrtate si bhisana kalahapraiya
Arau yetiya si ubhati yaya, tetiya si prthiraita phachada (asanti) srsti arau sasyaksetra arau praani dhbansa karaibalai cesta karae; arau allahe phachada bhala napaya
Arau yetiya taka koraa haya, ‘allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa’, tetiya tara atmabhimane taka papa karaibalai utsaha diye, eteke jahanname'i tara babe yathesta. Niscaya i nikrsta bisraamasthala
Arau manuhara majata ene loko ache, yiye allahara santusti labhara babe nijake bikrai karai diye. Allaha te'omra bandasakalara prati atyanta sahanubhutisila
He muminasakala! Tomaloke paraipurnabharae ichalamata praraesa karaa arau cayatanara padanusarana nakaraiba. Niscaya si tomalokara prakasya satrau
Eteke tomalokara ocarata suspasta pramanadi ahara pichato yadi tomalokara padaskhalana ghate, tente jani thoraa, niscaya allaha mahaparaakramasali, prajnamaya

Sihamte e'i apeksata ache neki ye, allaha arau phiraistasakala meghara chamta sihamtara ocarata upasthita ha’ba? Arau sakalo bisayara mimansa hai yaba? Arau sakalo bisaya allahara ocarate'i pratyabartita ha’ba
